title: EU Aims to Fight Industrial Decline With ‘Made in Europe’ Law
description: The European Union is set to propose a swathe of new conditions to ensure local companies are prioritized when investment decisions are made in the region by member-states and foreign firms, upending a free-trade philosophy that has governed decades of policy.
content: The European Union is set to propose a swathe of new conditions to ensure local companies are prioritized when investment decisions are made in the region by member-states and foreign firms, upending a free-trade philosophy that has governed decades of policy.
